body_html:
Hi @AliceDinh, when you execute a binary via bazel run, you need to insert -- before any command-line arguments you want to pass to the target binary. Try changing

bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco --input_file=...

to

bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco -- --input_file=...
body_text:
Hi @AliceDinh, when you execute a binary via bazel run, you need to insert -- before any command-line arguments you want to pass to the target binary. Try changing
bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco --input_file=...
to
bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco -- --input_file=...
body:
Hi @AliceDinh, when you execute a binary via `bazel run`, you need to insert `--` before any command-line arguments you want to pass to the target binary. Try changing

`bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco --input_file=...`

to

`bazel run tensorflow/contrib/lite:toco -- --input_file=...`
